titleStmt.title: A reuelation of the true Minerua The effect of this booke. Who on earth be gods: and by what meanes mortall men may bee made immortall.
titleStmt.author: Blenerhasset, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree by Thomas Dawson, for Thomas Woodcoke,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Thomas Blener Hasset.
A verse eulogy of Queen Elizabeth.
The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
